features.title: Native PHP Enum Support
features.description: Leverage native PHP Enums for clean and type-safe approval status handling. Define approved, denied, and pending states in a structured and maintainable way.

features.title: Multiple Approval Flows
features.description: Define and manage multiple independent approval flows per model. Perfect for complex business processes with different approval scenarios.

features.title: Flexible Approval Logic
features.description: Control approvals using role-, user-, and permission-based logic. Combine rules and require specific amounts of approvals per group.

features.title: Seamless Filament Integration
features.description: Integrates smoothly with Filament components, forms, and views, allowing you to embed approval controls directly into your admin interface.

features.title: Business Logic Control
features.description: Dynamically control button visibility and approval flow states based on your own business logic and model conditions.

features.title: Expandable
features.description: Designed to be extendable and customizable, allowing you to adapt flows, logic, and behavior to fit your specific project needs.
